43  bool PIRManager::request(AbsRTTask *t, Resource *r, int n)
44  {
45  bool ret;
46 
47  DBGENTER(_PIRESMAN_DBG_LEV);
48 
49  TaskModel* taskModel = _sched->find(t);
50 
51  if (taskModel == NULL) {
52  throw BaseExc("Cannot find task model!");
53  }
54 
55  // if resource is not free...
56  if (r->isLocked()) {
57  DBGPRINT("Resource is locked");
58  // Task that owns the resource
59  AbsRTTask *owner = dynamic_cast<AbsRTTask *>(r->getOwner());
60  TaskModel* ownerModel = _sched->find(owner);
61 
62  if (ownerModel == NULL) {
63  throw BaseExc("Cannot find owner model!");
64  }
65 
66  // remove the owner from the scheduler. It is not executing.
67  _sched->extract(owner);
68 
69  // suspend the task.
70  _kernel->suspend(t);
71 
72  DBGPRINT("Raising priority");
73  // owner priority = task priority
74  ownerModel->changePriority(taskModel->getPriority());
75 
76  // reactivate the owner with the new priority
77  _kernel->activate(owner);
78 
79  // push the blocked task into the blocked queue
80  blocked[r->getName()].insert(taskModel);
81 
82  ret = false;
83  }
84  else {
85  // save owner's priority
86  DBGPRINT("Storing old priority");
87 
88  // (if the entry in oldPriorities does not exist?)
89  if (oldPriorities.find(t) == oldPriorities.end()) {
90  PRIORITY_MAP mm;
91  mm[r->getName()] = taskModel->getPriority();
92  oldPriorities[t] = mm;
93  }
94  else {
95  (oldPriorities[t])[r->getName()] = taskModel->getPriority();
96  }
97 
98  r->lock(t);
99  ret = true;
100  }
101 
102 
103 
104  return ret;
105  }
106 
107  void PIRManager::release(AbsRTTask *t, Resource *r, int n)
108  {
109  TaskModel* taskModel = _sched->find(t);
110 
111  DBGENTER(_PIRESMAN_DBG_LEV);
112 
113  r->unlock();
114  // see if there is any blocked task
115  if (!blocked[r->getName()].empty())
116  {
117  TaskModel *newTaskModel = blocked[r->getName()].front();
118  blocked[r->getName()].erase(newTaskModel);
119  _kernel->suspend(t);
120  taskModel->changePriority((oldPriorities[t])[r->getName()]);
121  if (t->isActive()) _kernel->activate(t);
122  _kernel->activate(newTaskModel->getTask());
123  r->lock(newTaskModel->getTask());
124  }
125 
126 
127  }
128 
129 } // namespace RTSim
